Class UIState

java.lang.Object
internship_management_system.ui.UIState
public class UIState extends Object
Stores the state of the UI such as current user, current internship opportunity, and current application.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UIState()
    Constructor to initialize the UI state with empty optionals.
